languages.text: "Обычай. Когда Леман Расс еще был юн и не знал Всеотца, ему довелось оказаться в погибшем селении клана Грабителей волн. Все они были убиты чудовищами, и души их бродили по руинам домов, взывая о мести. Не мог Леман Расс поговорить с мертвецами, успокоить их и подарить им покой, потому что он был живым, а они — нет".

"Custom. Back when Leman Russ was still young and did not yet know the Allfather, he found himself in the lost village of the Wave Raiders clan. They had all been slain by monsters and their souls now wandered the ruins of their homes, crying out for vengeance. Leman Russ could not speak to the dead, comfort them, or grant them peace, because he was alive and they were not."
languages.original_text: "Обычай. Когда Леман Расс еще был юн и не знал Всеотца, ему довелось оказаться в погибшем селении клана Грабителей волн. Все они были убиты чудовищами, и души их бродили по руинам домов, взывая о мести. Не мог Леман Расс поговорить с мертвецами, успокоить их и подарить им покой, потому что он был живым, а они — нет".

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “是传统。那个时候，黎曼·鲁斯还很年轻，还不认识全父。当时，他来到了袭浪者氏族被毁灭的村庄。村子里的人全被怪物杀害了，死者的灵魂在家园的废墟上游荡，渴望复仇。黎曼·鲁斯无法和那些死者对话，无法安慰他们，也无法给予他们安宁，因为他还活着，而那些人却已经死了。”
languages.original_text: "Custom. Back when Leman Russ was still young and did not yet know the Allfather, he found himself in the lost village of the Wave Raiders clan. They had all been slain by monsters and their souls now wandered the ruins of their homes, crying out for vengeance. Leman Russ could not speak to the dead, comfort them, or grant them peace, because he was alive and they were not."

traits.locale_text: “是传统。那个时候，黎曼·鲁斯还很年轻，还不认识全父。当时，他来到了袭浪者氏族被毁灭的村庄。村子里的人全被怪物杀害了，死者的灵魂在家园的废墟上游荡，渴望复仇。黎曼·鲁斯无法和那些死者对话，无法安慰他们，也无法给予他们安宁，因为他还活着，而那些人却已经死了。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「習わしだ。レマン・ラスがまだ全知の父を知らない、若かりしころまでさかのぼる。ラスはウェイブ・レイダーのクランが使ってた廃村で、自分の力に気づいた。ウェイブ・レイダーは全員モンスターに殺された後で、その魂は復讐を求め、荒れ果てた家をさまよってたんだ。レマン・ラスは死人と話すことも、慰めることも、安寧を与えることもできなかった。ラスは生きているのに、ウェイブ・レイダーは死んでたからな」
languages.original_text: "Custom. Back when Leman Russ was still young and did not yet know the Allfather, he found himself in the lost village of the Wave Raiders clan. They had all been slain by monsters and their souls now wandered the ruins of their homes, crying out for vengeance. Leman Russ could not speak to the dead, comfort them, or grant them peace, because he was alive and they were not."

traits.locale_text: 「習わしだ。レマン・ラスがまだ全知の父を知らない、若かりしころまでさかのぼる。ラスはウェイブ・レイダーのクランが使ってた廃村で、自分の力に気づいた。ウェイブ・レイダーは全員モンスターに殺された後で、その魂は復讐を求め、荒れ果てた家をさまよってたんだ。レマン・ラスは死人と話すことも、慰めることも、安寧を与えることもできなかった。ラスは生きているのに、ウェイブ・レイダーは死んでたからな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Por costumbre. Cuando Leman Russ aún era joven y no conocía al Padre de todas las cosas, acabó en la aldea perdida de los Incursores de las Olas. Todos habían muerto a manos de monstruos y sus almas vagaban por las ruinas de sus hogares, clamando venganza. Leman Russ no podía hablar con los muertos para reconfortarles y darles paz, porque él estaba vivo y ellos no».
languages.original_text: "Custom. Back when Leman Russ was still young and did not yet know the Allfather, he found himself in the lost village of the Wave Raiders clan. They had all been slain by monsters and their souls now wandered the ruins of their homes, crying out for vengeance. Leman Russ could not speak to the dead, comfort them, or grant them peace, because he was alive and they were not."

traits.locale_text: «Por costumbre. Cuando Leman Russ aún era joven y no conocía al Padre de todas las cosas, acabó en la aldea perdida de los Incursores de las Olas. Todos habían muerto a manos de monstruos y sus almas vagaban por las ruinas de sus hogares, clamando venganza. Leman Russ no podía hablar con los muertos para reconfortarles y darles paz, porque él estaba vivo y ellos no».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « C'est la tradition. Leman Russ était encore jeune et n'avait jamais entendu parler du Père de Tous quand il s'est retrouvé dans le village perdu du clan des Pilleurs des Vagues. Tous ses habitants avaient été tués par des monstres et leurs âmes hantaient les ruines de leurs demeures en criant vengeance. Mais Leman Russ ne pouvait pas parler à ces morts, les consoler ou leur apporter la paix, car il était vivant. »
languages.original_text: "Custom. Back when Leman Russ was still young and did not yet know the Allfather, he found himself in the lost village of the Wave Raiders clan. They had all been slain by monsters and their souls now wandered the ruins of their homes, crying out for vengeance. Leman Russ could not speak to the dead, comfort them, or grant them peace, because he was alive and they were not."

traits.locale_text: « C'est la tradition. Leman Russ était encore jeune et n'avait jamais entendu parler du Père de Tous quand il s'est retrouvé dans le village perdu du clan des Pilleurs des Vagues. Tous ses habitants avaient été tués par des monstres et leurs âmes hantaient les ruines de leurs demeures en criant vengeance. Mais Leman Russ ne pouvait pas parler à ces morts, les consoler ou leur apporter la paix, car il était vivant. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Tradition. Als Leman Russ noch jung war und den Allvater nicht kannte, gelangte er einmal in das verschollene Dorf des Wellenräuber-Clans. Alle waren von Monstern erschlagen worden, und ihre Geister wanderten nun durch die Ruinen ihres Zuhause und dürsteten nach Vergeltung. Leman Russ konnte nicht mit den Toten sprechen, sie trösten oder ihnen Frieden schenken, denn er war am Leben und sie nicht."
languages.original_text: "Custom. Back when Leman Russ was still young and did not yet know the Allfather, he found himself in the lost village of the Wave Raiders clan. They had all been slain by monsters and their souls now wandered the ruins of their homes, crying out for vengeance. Leman Russ could not speak to the dead, comfort them, or grant them peace, because he was alive and they were not."

traits.locale_text: "Tradition. Als Leman Russ noch jung war und den Allvater nicht kannte, gelangte er einmal in das verschollene Dorf des Wellenräuber-Clans. Alle waren von Monstern erschlagen worden, und ihre Geister wanderten nun durch die Ruinen ihres Zuhause und dürsteten nach Vergeltung. Leman Russ konnte nicht mit den Toten sprechen, sie trösten oder ihnen Frieden schenken, denn er war am Leben und sie nicht."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Gelenektir. Leman Russ hâlâ gençken ve Yücebaba'yı bilmezken kendini Dalga Baskıncıları klanının kayıp köyünde bulmuş. Tüm yerlileri canavarlar tarafından katledilmiş, ruhları evlerinin harabelerinde dolaşıp intikam için haykırıyorlarmış. Leman Russ onlarla konuşamamış, içlerini rahatlatamamış veya huzur getirememiş çünkü kendisi hayattayken onlar ölüymüş."
languages.original_text: "Custom. Back when Leman Russ was still young and did not yet know the Allfather, he found himself in the lost village of the Wave Raiders clan. They had all been slain by monsters and their souls now wandered the ruins of their homes, crying out for vengeance. Leman Russ could not speak to the dead, comfort them, or grant them peace, because he was alive and they were not."

Leman Russ onlarla konuşamamış, içlerini rahatlatamamış veya huzur getirememiş çünkü kendisi hayattaymış ve onlar ölüymüş."
